ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')

ExpSyntax.val: Trim({0,133})='' OR ISNULL({0,133}) AND (LastClicked()<>'CloseWindow' AND LastClicked()<>'v:ButtonAdd')
{0,129} < Date() AND {0,123}='C' AND (LastClicked()<>'CloseWindow' AND LastClicked()<>'v:ButtonAdd') AND {32768,109} = 'N'
StrBuild(MlsTrans('Exceed the maximum allowable due date, @1@ month and @2@days from Doc Date'),Str({0,336},'2'),Str({0,331},'2'))
MlsTrans('The field is required to fill')
MlsTrans('Date do not lay between the current date')
MlsTrans('Date is equal to or later than Order Date')
MlsTrans('Do you want to save the data ?')
MlsTrans('Do You want to close this windows ?')
MlsTrans('Invalid Asset Code !, Please Check Status asset')
MlsTrans('Please make sure the PPn is right!')
MlsTrans('Date must not exceed today''s date')
StrBuild(MlsTrans('Rounding cannot be greater than limit. Current Limit: @1@'), Trim(Str({0,445}, 'N'&{32768,139})))

'Untuk pembayaran perbaikan kendaraan dengan : No Polisi : '&IF(ISNULL({0,451}),'',Trim({0,451}))&' Model : '&IF(ISNULL({0,452}),'',Trim({0,452}))&' No SPK : '&IF(ISNULL({0,506}),'',Trim({0,506}))&' No Invoice : '&IF(ISNULL({0,455}) OR {0,455} = '',Trim(Str({0,125},'15')),{0,455})

'Untuk klaim asuransi servis Kendaraan Jenis Kendaraan: '&IF({0,452} <> '' AND NOT ISNULL({0,452}),Trim({0,452}),'')&' dengan Nomor Polisi: '&IF(ISNULL({0,451}) OR {0,451} = '','',Trim({0,451}))&' dan No. Polis Asuransi: '&IF(ISNULL({0,381}) OR {0,512} = '','',Trim({0,512}))&' yang sudah dikurangin dengan Own Risk sebesar '&IF(NOT ISNULL({0,509}) AND NOT ISNULL({0,510}),Trim(Str({0,509}*{0,510},'15C')),'0')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select DocType,a.DocEntry,TrackNo,itemCode, ModelName,EngNo,ChNo,Color,tnkbColor,a.CardCode,CardName,DocStatus,isInsurance from OSPK a (nolock) where BplId=:4 and ItemCode like '%:1%' :5 and canceled='N' :2 :3 and DocStatus in(':6') AND isInsurance in (':7')

ExpSyntax.val: '*Garansi hanya berlaku jika melakukan pembelian dan pemasangan di jaringan ASTRA Otoservice dan Shop&Drive'
IF({0,31} = 1, MlsTrans('JASA SERVICE'), MlsTrans('SPAREPART / OIL / MATERIAL'))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select VatGroup,VatPrcnt,sum(VatSum) vatsum from dpi1 where docentry=:1 group by VatGroup,VatPrcnt order by VatPrcnt desc
select count(0) from OINV where NumAtCard = ':1' and DocDate between ':2' and ':3' and CANCELED = 'N'
select SUM(DpmAmnt-DpmAppl) as dpamt from ODPI where cardcode= ':1' AND docstatus = 'C' and DpmStatus ='O' and DocType = ':3' and DocCur=':2'

SELECT OINV.DocEntry, OINV.NumAtCard, OINV.Comments, OITB.ItmsGrpNam, OINV.DiscPrcnt, OITM.ItemName, Quantity, Price, PriceBefDi, LineTotal, OpenSumFC, OpenSum, OINV.DiscSum, OINV.RoundDif, OINV.DpmAmnt, SYS_GCM.DESCRIPTION FROM OINV (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN (Select DocEntry,ItemCode,SUM(Quantity) Quantity,SUM(Price) Price,SUM(PriceBefDi) PriceBefDi ,SUM(LineTotal) LineTotal,SUM(OpenSumFC) OpenSumFC,SUM(OpenSum) OpenSum from inv1 Group By DocEntry, ItemCode) INV1 ON INV1.DocEntry = OINV.DocEntry LEFT JOIN OITM ON INV1.ItemCode = OITM.ItemCode LEFT JOIN OITB ON OITM.ItmsGrpCod = OITB.ItmsGrpCod LEFT JOIN SYS_GCM ON SYS_GCM.CONDITION = 'INACBG' AND OITM.MatGrp = SYS_GCM.GCM_ID WHERE OINV.DocEntry = :1 ORDER BY SYS_GCM.GCM_ID, OINV.NumAtCard

SELECT OINV.DocEntry, OINV.Comments, OINV.NumAtCard, OINV.CardName, OINV.DocDate, OPRC.PrcName, OCRD.CardName, OCRD.GTSRegNum, OCPR.BirthDate, OCPR.Gender, OCPR.Address, OCPR.Cellolar, SO_H.Date_Order, SO_H.discharge_date, DATEDIFF(DAY, OCPR.BirthDate, OINV.DocDate) AS AgeDays, OINV.DiscSum, OINV.RoundDif, OINV.DpmAmnt FROM OINV LEFT JOIN OPRC ON OINV.U_IDU_Kode_PT = OPRC.PrcCode LEFT JOIN OCRD ON OINV.FatherCard = OCRD.CardCode LEFT JOIN OCPR ON OCRD.cntctprsn = OCPR.cntctcode AND OCRD.CardCode = OCPR.CardCode LEFT JOIN SO_H ON OINV.NumAtCard = SO_H.Name WHERE OINV.DocEntry = :1

ExpSyntax.val: StrBuild(MlsTrans('@1@ Tahun @2@ Bulan @3@ Hari'), Trim(Str({0,1}, '3')), Trim(Str({0,2}, '2')), Trim(Str({0,3}, '2')))
'Untuk pembayaran perbaikan kendaraan dengan nomor polisi : {NoPol} dan model : {model} dengan nomor SPK : {NoSPK} dan No Invoice : {NoINV}'
'Untuk klaim asuransi servis Kendaraan Jenis Kendaraan: {model} dengan Nomor Polisi: {NoPol} dan No. Polis Asuransi: {NoPolis} yang sudah dikurangin dengan Own Risk sebesar {OwnRisk}'
